11.1.hd_quote: The serendipity of being in the right place at the right time.
11.1.behavioral_axis: Tunes ideas to place and timing before sharing.
11.1.shadow_axis: Pushes ideas at the wrong moment; misses the window.

11.2.hd_quote: You are projecting ideas out without the value of introspection.
11.2.behavioral_axis: Applies vigilance so ideas mature before exposure.

11.3.behavioral_axis: Learns which ideas endure by cycling through many.
11.3.shadow_axis: Treats every idea as truth; stirs drama.

11.4.hd_quote: The ability to express the essential nature of peace.
11.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes a single clear idea that others can grasp.
11.4.shadow_axis: Dogmatic; limits wisdom to a chosen few.

11.5.hd_quote: The motiveless nurturing of the disenfranchised to ensure harmony.
11.5.behavioral_axis: Shares ideas for collective benefit without needing credit.
11.5.shadow_axis: Withholds direct contact; gives ideas as defense.

11.6.hd_quote: The inner balance to accept transition.
11.6.behavioral_axis: Tracks when ideas end and new ones must emerge.
11.6.shadow_axis: Speculates for personal gain; aloof from people.
